MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G81 postcode area of Clydebank, affecting properties in Alexander Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.31pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Clydebank Creamery substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.28pm on Wednesday 31 March 2021.
